sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access/>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FNFields</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Returns valid fields for normalization.</description>
        <name>FNFields</name>
        <script><![CDATA[// field normalization

var FNFields = Class.create();

FNFields.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {
  }, 

  process: function(table, containing_table) {
     var gr = new GlideRecord('fn_type');
     result = [];
     if (containing_table == 'fn_normalize_config') {
        gr.addQuery('use_for_normalize', true);
     } else if (containing_table == 'fn_transform_config') {
        gr.addQuery('use_for_transform', true);
     } else
        return result;
     gr.query();
     while (gr.next())
        result.push('' + gr.type);
     return result;
  }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>tom.dilatush</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2010-12-25 17:52:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1ea2c3c40ab3015813f58c00e1d74be0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FNFields</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Field Normalization" source="com.snc.field_normalization">74d312912f730110d8a4d5f62799b6a5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1ea2c3c40ab3015813f58c00e1d74be0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>tom.dilatush</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2011-01-06 14:45:10</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>588</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
